title: How to Make Spinach Rolls

steps.headline: Gather your supplies (you want everything to make this on hand were you can reach it easily).
steps.description: You will need salt, tomatoes, spinach, cream cheese, soft taco shells, a knife, a cutting board, and a plate.

steps.headline: Take a taco shell and lay it out on your plate.
Spread the cream cheese with a knife over the whole taco shell.
steps.description: If you don't like a lot of cream cheese, spread the cream cheese over the center of the taco shell.

steps.headline: Place the spinach leaves over the cream cheese.
steps.description: If you love spinach you can add as many leaves as you want. If you hate spinach just add a few. Don't forget to wash the spinach before you use it.

steps.headline: Grab your tomato, wash it, and place it on the cutting board.
Take the knife and carefully cut the tomato in medium slices.
Take the sliced tomato slices and place them on top of the spinach.
Take the salt and lightly sprinkle it over the tomato slices.
steps.description: If you love salt then shake the salt shaker violently over the tomato slices until you have enough to suit you.

steps.headline: Roll up the taco or fold it like a burrito.
Enjoy your spinach roll!
steps.description: If you want, cut the roll in slices and enjoy them in bite size snacks.

text: Gather your supplies (you want everything to make this on hand were you can reach it easily). You will need salt, tomatoes, spinach, cream cheese, soft taco shells, a knife, a cutting board, and a plate. Take a taco shell and lay it out on your plate.  Spread the cream cheese with a knife over the whole taco shell. If you don't like a lot of cream cheese, spread the cream cheese over the center of the taco shell. Place the spinach leaves over the cream cheese. If you love spinach you can add as many leaves as you want. If you hate spinach just add a few. Don't forget to wash the spinach before you use it. Grab your tomato, wash it, and place it on the cutting board.  Take the knife and carefully cut the tomato in medium slices.  Take the sliced tomato slices and place them on top of the spinach.  Take the salt and lightly sprinkle it over the tomato slices. If you love salt then shake the salt shaker violently over the tomato slices until you have enough to suit you. Roll up the taco or fold it like a burrito.  Enjoy your spinach roll! If you want, cut the roll in slices and enjoy them in bite size snacks.
